attributes.action: Reinstate SOME rights for smokers OR make it totally illegal.......
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This way the Government would be seen to be fair, inasmuch as they would no  longer receive huge amounts of tax revenue on tobacco sales.. Double dealing is not worthy of any Government.. Better to hold their hands up to this contravention of justice and make SOME provisions for the smokers who provide them with this large amount of revenue every year.
